'''2.2.11103''' ({{w|Microsoft Windows|Windows}}), '''2.2.11105''' ({{w|Microsoft Windows|Windows}}, via the {{w|Microsoft Store}}/{{W|Xbox (app)|Xbox app}}), '''2.2.11104''' ({{w|macOS}}), or '''2.2.11106''' ({{w|Linux}}), is an update to the [[Minecraft Launcher|launcher]] released on March 1, 2022.

== Additions ==
* Added mouseover tooltip to "Clean up cached account tokens" advanced settings button.

== Changes ==
* Made some error messages clearer and more useful.
* Updated some outdated textures/blocks in the installations icon list.

== Fixes ==
* Fixed many miscellaneous under-the-hood stability and reliability issues.
* Fixed bugs related to the Mojang to Microsoft Account migration.
* Fixed volume install dialog default logic.
* {{bug|MCL-19984}} - Java Edition shows Demo with active Xbox Game Pass subscription.
* {{bug|MCL-20491}} - Game stuck on "making things awesome" screen.
* {{bug|MCL-20768}} - Setting username from within Launcher limits name to 13 characters.
* {{bug|MCL-21101}} - Z-fighting can be seen where the legs and torsos of player models in the "Skins" tab intersect one another.</onlyinclude>
